    • distance

      public double distance(Pointer other)
      Calculates the distance between the current position and another position represented by a Pointer.
      Parameters:
      other - The other Pointer.
      Returns:
      The distance between the current position and the position of the other Pointer.

    • distance

      public double distance(double x, double y)
      Calculates the distance between the current position and a specified point.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the point.
      y - The y-coordinate of the point.
      Returns:
      The distance between the current position and the point.

    • getPosMirror

      public void getPosMirror(double x, double y)
      Calculates the mirrored position of the current position with respect to a point. Central symmetry
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the mirror point.
      y - The y-coordinate of the mirror point.

    • getPosMirror

      public void getPosMirror(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Calculates the mirrored position of the current position with respect to a line defined by two points. Axial symmetry
      Parameters:
      x1 - The x of the first point
      y1 - The y of the first point
      x2 - The x of the second point
      y2 - The y of the second point
